title: Technical Program Manager II, Embedded Systems, Pixel and Fitbit
location: Cambridge, MA, USA; Mountain View, CA, USA
description: A problem isn’t truly solved until it’s solved for all. That’s why Googlers build products that help create opportunities for everyone, whether down the street or across the globe. As a Technical Program Manager at Google, you’ll use your technical expertise to lead complex, multi-disciplinary projects from start to finish.
key_qualifications: Bachelor's degree in a relevant field, or equivalent practical experience. 2 years of experience managing projects. Experience with software development or consumer electronics.
preferred_qualifications: 2 years of experience managing cross-functional or cross-team projects. Experience tracking and executing software deliverables and hardware variations. Experience with algorithms. Experience developing operational and product quality KPIs, with excellent technical, analytical, and cross-functional collaboration skills. Ability to adapt and meet the needs of a changing and growing organization.
responsibilities: Manage the software development life-cycle of embedded system software algorithm features. Drive the planning and implementation of programs and features with the cross-functional teams to hit roadmap goals...
